description: the args to api.ec2.cloud.terminate_instances are parsed from the HTTP query and passed as kwargs.  i renamed 'instance_id'  to 'ec2_id_list' recently, not knowing this fact.  it needs to change back.
title: ec2 terminate_instances has incorrect keyword arg

comments.content: the args to api.ec2.cloud.terminate_instances are parsed from the HTTP query and passed as kwargs.  i renamed 'instance_id'  to 'ec2_id_list' recently, not knowing this fact.  it needs to change back.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gundlach
